mapper.select: select id, name, image, order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, dish_flavor, number, amount from order_detail where order_id = #{id}

select od.name as name, sum(od.number) as number from orders o left join order_detail od on o.id = od.order_id where status = 5 and order_time >= #{begin} and order_time < #{end} group by od.name order by number desc limit 0, 10

select sum(case when status = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as waitingOrders, sum(case when status = 3 then 1 else 0 end) as deliveredOrders, sum(case when status = 5 then 1 else 0 end) as completedOrders, sum(case when status = 6 then 1 else 0 end) as cancelledOrders, count(id) as allOrders from orders where DATE(order_time) = CURDATE()
